alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 11 at 7:53PM CDT until June 14 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. .Red River levels continue to drop in Oslo, with action stage nearing early next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Oslo. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 26.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. County Road 2 south of Oslo is closed in sections 2 and 11 of Pulaski Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 27.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 PM CDT Saturday was 27.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue falling to 21.3 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
